resources.string: Create and send push notifications to Users,\nClubs or both
Create Passcodes to authenticate clubs \n and send them to club emails

The Clubs feature allows the users to go through a list of clubs in the university.
 
 
 Clicking on the club will allow users to view their description.

The Activities feature allows the users to go through a list of club activities: .
 
 
 The Activities can be filtered to the users preferred filter.
 
 
 The Activities can be selected and have an alarm set for them.

The Activities feature for the clubs allows the clubs to create new Activities.
 
 
 Creating a new Activity will cause a notification to be sent to the University Admin.
 
 
 The Admin will decide if the Activity is to be Approved.
 
 
 Filling in all the fields will allow the Admin to make a decision easily.

The Profile feature for the clubs allows the clubs to Upload their club picture which will be displayed to the Admin and the Users.
 
 
 Clubs can add their name which will be seen by Users and the Admin.
 
 
 Clubs can add their description which will be seen by Users and Admin.

The Notification feature allows the admin to send notifications to the users and the clubs.
 
 
 Notifications will be personalized by the admin.
 
 
 Notifications will be in the form of pop up messages in the notification pane.

The Settings 3 features: .
 
 
 The Dark Mode allows for a better user experience at night.
 
 
 Changing of languages between English and Turkish.
 
 
 Requesting a change of password.

Approve activities is a feature solely for the admin.
 
 
 It allows the admin to view activities and choose to reject or approve activities.
 
 
 The admin can also choose to hold the approval request.

Smart Scheduler is a feature solely for the users.
 
 
 It displays a calender.
 
 
 Upon tapping a time slot the scheduler will show available activities.

Approve Clubs is a feature solely for the admin.
 
 
 It allows the admin to generate passcodes and send them to clubs to authenticate their sign-up.
